|  [iconClick\_(e)](./blockly.mutator_class.iconclick__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Clicking on the icon toggles if the mutator bubble is visible. Disable if block is uneditable. |

|  [shouldIgnoreMutatorEvent\_(e)](./blockly.mutator_class.shouldignoremutatorevent__1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the given event in the mutator workspace should be ignored when deciding whether to update the workspace and compose the block or not. |
|  [updateBlockStyle()](./blockly.mutator_class.updateblockstyle_1_method.md) |  | Update the styles on all blocks in the mutator. |
|  [updateEditable()](./blockly.mutator_class.updateeditable_1_method.md) |  | Add or remove the UI indicating if this icon may be clicked or not. |
